channel.title: Cathy Newman / @cathynewman
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @cathynewman. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: incredible anyone has to say this but sneering at a working class female Labour MP for going to the opera is not a brilliant look
item.dc:creator: @PickardJE
item.description: incredible anyone has to say this but sneering at a working class female Labour MP for going to the opera is not a brilliant look

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: Rayner responds to Raab:
“My advice to the deputy prime minister is to cut out the snobbery & brush up on his opera. The Marriage of Figaro is the story of a working-class woman who gets the better of a privileged but dim-witted villain.”
item.dc:creator: @PickardJE
item.description:
Rayner responds to Raab:

“My advice to the deputy prime minister is to cut out the snobbery & brush up on his opera. The Marriage of Figaro is the story of a working-class woman who gets the better of a privileged but dim-witted villain.”

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: “She walked everywhere. She put her party shoes in a bag and donned her trainers. She walked. Zara believed that a woman should be able to walk home…She was in the heart of her community, ten minutes from home. 'We all need to be talking about what happened to OUR ZARA”
item.dc:creator: @fatimamanji
item.description:
“She walked everywhere. She put her party shoes in a bag and donned her trainers. She walked. Zara believed that a woman should be able to walk home…She was in the heart of her community, ten minutes from home.
'We all need to be talking about what happened to OUR ZARA”

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: Watch the full interview here: https://www.channel4.com/news/russian-ambassador-ukrainian-shopping-mall-hit-by-missile-was-empty
item.dc:creator: @Channel4News
item.description: Watch the full interview here: channel4.com/news/russian-am…

item.dc:creator: @Channel4News
item.description:
"Are you scared of Putin?"
"Me? No. Why? Why should I be scared of Putin?"

@cathynewman talks to Russia's ambassador to the UK Andrei Kelin, and asks if he was informed about Putin's plan to invade Ukraine.

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: Happy Birthday to us… 🎵🎵🎂🎂
We are 2 years old today. ⁦
Best decision I ever made. And I’ve made a few rubbish ones. 👀
It IS hard getting out of bed at 3.10am BUT you make it all worth it X
@timesradio
item.dc:creator: @AasmahMir

item.title: Mother of murdered women Bibaa Henry and Nicole Smallman, Mina Smallman, tells me on @Channel4News the @metpoliceuk Commissioner Dame Cressida Dick should return some of her reported £166k payoff now the force has been put in special measures.
item.dc:creator: @cathynewman
item.description: Mother of murdered women Bibaa Henry and Nicole Smallman, Mina Smallman, tells me on @Channel4News the @metpoliceuk Commissioner Dame Cressida Dick should return some of her reported £166k payoff now the force has been put in special measures.

item.title: I also asked him why Russia had banned me & 28 other UK journalists from entering the country. He said it was because we didn’t publish the “correct information”. Watch on 4+1 if you missed it.
item.dc:creator: @cathynewman
item.description:
I also asked him why Russia had banned me & 28 other UK journalists from entering the country. He said it was because we didn’t publish the “correct information”. Watch on 4+1 if you missed it.

item.title: Russia’s Ambassador to UK tells me a war between #Russia & Nato “cannot occur”…but then he did tell me he was “100 per cent sure” his country wouldn’t invade #Ukraine just six days before they did. He says now he didn’t know. @Channel4News
item.dc:creator: @cathynewman
item.description: Russia’s Ambassador to UK tells me a war between #Russia & Nato “cannot occur”…but then he did tell me he was “100 per cent sure” his country wouldn’t invade #Ukraine just six days before they did. He says now he didn’t know. @Channel4News

item.title: Exclusive with Russia's ambassador to UK on @Channel4News - plus @mattfrei is at #Nato in Madrid. AND - Mina Smallman, mother of Bibaa & Nicole, gives me her reaction to the @metpoliceuk being placed in special measures PLUS @C4Ciaran is in Edinburgh on #indyref2 - join us at 7

item.title: Banned by #Russia but now invited into the @RussianEmbassy - loads of questions. Watch the answers on tonight’s @Channel4News

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: Tory MP Danny Kruger says he doesn’t agree “that women have an absolute right to bodily autonomy” on abortion.
He says he doesn’t believe we should lecture the United States on this “political” decision.
item.dc:creator: @PoliticsJOE_UK
item.description:
Tory MP Danny Kruger says he doesn’t agree “that women have an absolute right to bodily autonomy” on abortion.

He says he doesn’t believe we should lecture the United States on this “political” decision.

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: We need women to put themselves forward for elected office at every single level please! 🙏
item.dc:creator: @annaturley
item.description: We need women to put themselves forward for elected office at every single level please! 🙏

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: "Shout out to your prime minister, Mr Boris Johnson. This gentleman is a really a huge help to us."
Ahead of their Glastonbury appearance Eurovision winners Kalush speak to @CathyNewman about their favourite Brit - Boris Johnson.
item.dc:creator: @TimesRadio
item.description:
"Shout out to your prime minister, Mr Boris Johnson. This gentleman is a really a huge help to us."

Ahead of their Glastonbury appearance Eurovision winners Kalush speak to @CathyNewman about their favourite Brit - Boris Johnson.

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: I heard the news that American women have lost the right to abortion as part of healthcare while reporting the #AfghanistanEarthquake. Here men initially refused to allow ‘their’ women be treated for broken bones because they shouldn’t appear in public. Why do they hate us?
item.dc:creator: @lindseyhilsum
item.description:
I heard the news that American women have lost the right to abortion as part of healthcare while reporting the #AfghanistanEarthquake. Here men initially refused to allow ‘their’ women be treated for broken bones because they shouldn’t appear in public. Why do they hate us?

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: I watched my mother's life and I knew I wanted better. And I did - thanks to #TitleIX and #Roe. I want my daughters to watch my life and dream even bigger. Not envy that I had access to abortion and they won't.
item.dc:creator: @AnnOlivarius
item.description:
I watched my mother's life and I knew I wanted better. And I did - thanks to #TitleIX and #Roe.
I want my daughters to watch my life and dream even bigger. Not envy that I had access to abortion and they won't.
